text: Sir William Macpherson of Cluny (William Alan Macpherson; 1 April 1926 - 14 February 2021) was a Scottish High Court judge. He served as the 27th Hereditary Chief of the Clan Macpherson. In the late 1990s, Macpherson led the public inquiry into the murder of Stephen Lawrence. Macpherson was born in Blairgowrie, Perth and Kinross, Scotland. He studied at Summer Fields School, a preparatory school near Oxford. He later studied at Wellington College in Crowthorne and Trinity College, Oxford. Macpherson died on 14 February 2021, aged 94. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Scottish judges Category:People from Perth and Kinross
title: William Macpherson
